title: regression: unused imports false positive on nightly for the mach crate

labels.name: A-lint
labels.description: Area: Lints (warnings about flaws in source code) such as unused_mut.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
With the latest version of the `mach` crate, running `cargo test` shows:

```shell
warning: unused import: `vm_region::*`                                                                                                                    
   --> src/vm.rs:200:9                                                                                                                                    
    |                                                                                                                                                     
200 |     use vm_region::*;                                                                                                                               
    |         ^^^^^^^^^^^^                                                                                                                                
    |                                                                                                                                                     
    = note: #[warn(unused_imports)] on by default                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                          
warning: unused import: `vm_types::*`                                                                                                                     
   --> src/vm.rs:202:9                                                                                                                                    
    |                                                                                                                                                     
202 |     use vm_types::*;                                                                                                                                
    |         ^^^^^^^^^^^     
```

This warning did not used to trigger, and is incorrect (removing the import breaks the build).
